cells.data:
Hi Team,

Ever find yourself in need a demo account with tons of content? How about 412 1080p movie trailers? Just finished my ingest, account ID
70829877001 is good to go!


Its set up for Akamai HD2 delivery w/UDS. Has 2 MP4 renditions and 5 HLS renditions.

Currently setting up for Iris TV demo with recommendations.

Content has been tagged with category of trailer (Romance, Horror, Thriller, Action Adventure)

If you need anything, let me know...

I'll run the ref-gen overnight to get ref IDs just in case anyone needs them.



Thank you,

Carl Rutman | Director, Sales Engineering | Brightcove Inc.
P: 617.500.4944 M: 617.510.6112
290 Congress St, 4th Floor, Boston MA 02110
